author: StingyJack
body:
From the [PS 5.1 docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/Remove-Item?view=powershell-5.1)

> Because the Recurse parameter in Remove-Item has a known issue, the command in this example uses Get-ChildItem to get the desired files, and then uses the pipeline operator to pass them to Remove-Item.

Did this get fixed in v6?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@StingyJack You feel free load latest PowerShell Core and check scenarios you want.

I believe it is dup #3727
